Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Torremolinos, Hotel Riu Costa Lago - All Inclusive is connected to the airport and convenient to Los Alamos Beach and Bajondillo Beach. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Palace of Congresses and Exhibitions and Costa del Sol Square.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 256 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature bidets and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don't miss out on recreational opportunities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and gift shops/newsstands. If you'd like to spend the day shopping, you can hop on the shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
This hotel is all inclusive. Rates include meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Riu Costa Lago - All Inclusive. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
This hotel is all inclusive. Rates include meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Riu Costa Lago - All Inclusive. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Torremolinos, Hotel Riu Costa Lago - All Inclusive is connected to the airport and convenient to Los Alamos Beach and Bajondillo Beach. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Palace of Congresses and Exhibitions and Costa del Sol Square.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Los Alamos Beach - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Bajondillo Beach - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Palace of Congresses and Exhibitions - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Costa del Sol Square - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Aqualand - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Aqualand Torremolinos - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Parador Malaga Golf Club - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Crocodile Park - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Torremolinos Synagogue - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Plaza de Toros Torremolinos - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
La Bateria Park - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
La Carihuela - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
El Saltillo Beach - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Sea-Life - 5 km / 3.1 mi
Benalmadena Marina - 5 km / 3.1 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Riu Costa Lago - All Inclusive is Malaga (AGP) - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

M치laga Airport (AGP): Approximate driving time is 10 minutes and distance is 5 kilometers (3 miles).

The airport is located six kilometers west of M치laga. Trains to M치laga, Fuengirola and Torremolinos leave the airport every 30 minutes. Bus services to M치laga depart from outside the International arrivals terminal. Taxis are also available at the airport.

The best ways to get around Torremolinos are on foot or by taxi. A car is recommended for exploring other parts of the surrounding area. Mopeds can also be hired.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.

Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
